changeSet.author: wangjun
changeSet.sql: create table gateway_route( `ID` varchar(64) not null primary key comment'主键', `PREDICATES` varchar(256) not null comment '匹配路径', `URI` varchar(256) not null comment '转发的服务地址', `FILTERS` varchar(256) default '' comment '过滤器', `DELETE_FLAG` tinyint default 0 comment '是否删除,0:未删除,1:已删除', `CREATE_AT` timestamp not null default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment '创建时间', `UPDATE_AT` timestamp not null default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP comment '更新时间' )ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_bin COMMENT = '路由表' ROW_FORMAT = Compact;

changeSet.author: wangjun
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `s_resource_url` ( `RESOURCE_ID` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `PARENT_RESOURCE_ID` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '访问URL关联的资源id(即这个URL属于那个资源下边的)', `RESOURCE_TYPE` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '资源类型：-1.游客资源 0.私有资源', `RESOURCE_NAME` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'URL资源名称', `URL` varchar(300) NOT NULL COMMENT '后台接口URL地址', `METHOD` varchar(10) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '接口访问方式例：GET,POST', `REMARK` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `DELETE_FLAG` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '是否删除,0:未删除,1:已删除', `CREATE_AT` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `UPDATE_AT` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`RESOURCE_ID`), KEY `rId_rType_index` (`RESOURCE_TYPE`, `PARENT_RESOURCE_ID`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE = utf8_bin COMMENT = 'url表' ROW_FORMAT = Compact;
